body_html: Beware that the torch.nn.backends.thnn.backend.SpatialConvolutionLocal function mentioned above is very slow, feeding it batches you get no parallelisation (minibatch of 10 is 10x the time of a 1 batch). At least in pyTorch 0.3.1. Other high-level methods using Unfold seem to work better.

At least in pyTorch 0.3.1. Other high-level methods using Unfold seem to work better.
body: Beware that the torch.nn.backends.thnn.backend.SpatialConvolutionLocal function mentioned above is very slow, feeding it batches you get no parallelisation (minibatch of 10 is 10x the time of a 1 batch). At least in pyTorch 0.3.1. Other high-level methods using Unfold seem to work better.
